title: Hi people, state of the community right now take a look!

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
Riot can you take a look at this, this is what it is like playing in your dumb community, everyone thinks they are gods, i spend more time dodging than I do playing because of these people and they throw games intentionally, abuse people and are all in all toxic for no reason or because they see what you have done as a person attack on them even if it's as innocent as taking a wave when you aren't in lane, I am sick to death of this fucking community, I myself am toxic but this is why, the people on here are freaking infuriating, clean up this community, ban people, do something to help make it a better place, it is like a majority of people in this game are a bunch of mindless 12 year olds that think they are the be all and end all of everything.
FBG UGOTSMURFED, has a history of trolling, being toxic and throwing games and you know why?
Because he demands respect, if you don't give him said respect he refuses to help the team and intentionally throws, I took 8 cs because he wasn't in lane and my ally braum said that he misses D1, which our lucian took great offense too and proceeded to endlessly split push, feed, die and refuse to group.
Riot please, do something for fuck sakes.
His match history: http://tinypic.com/?t=postupload
Rant over

replies.body: For god sakes, so many bad baits.

You're just as bad as him though I don't get the point of this.

I'm with Phantom, this has to be bait.

so....1 person. who you added after he trolled a game....said some things.

sad little prick you are. go back to club penguin if you dont like the community. you 9 year old autistic %%%%.
